titleStmt.title: The true non-conformist in answere to the modest and free conference betwixt a conformist and a non-conformist about the present distempers of Scotland / by a lover of truth ...
titleStmt.author: McWard, Robert, 1633?-1687.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
Attributed to Robert McWard. cf. NUC pre-1956.
